column3: No sure if it's worth to touch this file with cosmetic changes.\nping @theuni
@lemzwerg Could you split the changes into one commit each? It might be the case that you'll get ACK:s on some of the changes and NACK:s on some.
@lemzwerg Is there a linting tool that can find the issues you addressed in this PR?
@lemzwerg Could you investigate the OS X build failure? :-)

@jonasschnelli, I can easily provide a complete formatted rewrite that avoids overlong lines, has a more vertical flow, and much more comments – I did this already in a private version, mainly to get completely accommodated to the file since I want to use it in one of my own projects.  Just tell me whether I shall submit such a change (on top of the real buglets).\n\n@practicalswift, I will prov

Concept ACK! Nice cleanups and thanks for splitting up the changes into separate commits!\n\nAlso: Werner, a huge thank you is hereby sent to you for the FreeType project and your >20 years of working on it! ❤️
